title: Select Material for Corrosive Service
description: A mechanical engineer is designing a tank for storing a corrosive chemical and must select an appropriate, cost-effective material.

tasks.description: Identify the chemical to be stored and its concentration and temperature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the service conditions.

tasks.description: Consult a material compatibility database to find suitable materials for this service.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that both Stainless Steel 316L and Hastelloy C276 are suitable.

tasks.description: Compare the cost of the two suitable materials and select the more economical option (Stainless Steel 316L) for the design.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compares the costs and specifies the cheaper, suitable material in the design document.
